name: Super Spring Ninja Prototype
description:
Aim your nInja and catapult him through crazy obstacles
This is a game approx 3 months from completion it needs a lot of work, but im going to put her through green light and see what the community thinks.
This game is a bit odd, and is sort of a mutant hybrid of meat boy and angry birds - While it resembles a platformer, I dunno if Id call it that. Its more about aiming than jumping.


Check it out if you so desire and if it interests you please vote on Steam Greenlight and share

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
